citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The environmental enhancement plan was not documented in writing.
Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan for environment
enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of nonhuman primates.
This document needs to be made available at the next inspection. To be corrected by July 9, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with representatives from the facility.
Additional Inspectors:
MEGAN ADAMS, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The environmental  enhancement plan was not documented in writing. 
 
Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan for environment 
enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of nonhuman primates. 
 
This document needs to be made available at the next inspection.  To be corrected by July 9, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with representatives  from the facility. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
MEGAN ADAMS, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd  Section
